summary: An email from Justin Houston, a program manager at Convergint Federal/SigNet Technologies, to an unspecified recipient regarding the delayed installation of surveillance gear at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York. The email references a purchase order from September 2018, delivery around October 2018, and that installation was only completed after an unspecified 'incident'.
